entry.title: The Way He Looks At Me
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,717Chapters: 6/8Kudos: 37

Summary: Derek Hale doesn’t know how to let people stay. Trauma taught him that love is dangerous, that opening the door only leads to more loss. First Hannah, then Laura. He’s still reeling, still holding himself together with frayed edges and silence.Stiles Stilinski doesn’t care. He shows up anyway, armed with too many questions, stubborn loyalty, and a steady presence Derek doesn’t know how to turn away. Somewhere between holding Derek up and keeping him grounded, Stiles falls in love.This is the story of Derek learning that healing is possible, that love can be safe, and that sometimes survival isn’t enough. Sometimes, you get to have more. And that people should be held accountable for their actions.

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,798Chapters: 18/35Kudos: 418

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that.What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser.Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hales being a close knit family

entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,748Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 59

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 184,463Chapters: 21/40Kudos: 585

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: Keystone Species
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,451Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 62

Summary: They didn't talk much about why Stiles was back in town. His mother had been inordinately proud of that fact she went into labor and delivered Stiles alone in the woods. It was the eighties, she couldn’t exactly call her husband on her cell phone. Stiles was born healthy in the preserve. Scott got hurt. Scott is Stiles to protect. He always has been. Stiles is pissed about quite a few things. “Scott is my fifteen year old cousin! And you hurt him and then left him alone and hurt? What’s wrong with you?” He has gotten very close to Derek’s face. Stiles takes a breath and turns away. Or- what if Stiles was the responsible adult at home?

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 304

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded. “What?” “The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.” “That’s impossible,” Derek whispered. “Not really, it comes around every seven days.” “This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,495Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 143

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: of principal visits and soft nights
entry.summary:
Author: suitelif3

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,586Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 82

Summary: They eventually made it back to Derek’s house after a long day of outings, and Eli ended up tucked gently into Derek’s shoulder, his eyes blinking blearily, struggling to stay awake. “Do you want to come in?” Derek asked softly. “If I’m still welcome to,” Stiles replied. “You’re always welcome, Stiles,” Derek stated, his eyebrows up, a little grin playing on the edge of his mouth. Stiles tried to tamp down the fluttery feeling he was getting in his chest. If not for himself, then for the werewolves he was standing right next to that could almost certainly pick up on it.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,011Chapters: 3/15Kudos: 43

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.
